content:
the Student Activities Board has scheduled a night of laughter on Tuesday with the booking of actor comedian and Saturday Night Live alumnus Tim Meadows PERIOD

Meadows known for his character Leon Phelps from the film The Ladies Man will be performing alongside Joe Canle and Brad Morris both members of Chicagos The Second City comedy troupe PERIOD

We are very excited to bring Meadows to Saint Louis University and are expecting a great crowd to see this legendary comedian SAB President Kris Priemer said PERIOD This event will not be your typical standup show  PERIOD something SLU has not seen for many years. due to the improvisational nature of the show Priemer said that an energentic and enthusiastic audience is essential to drive the show to its full potential. the show will be free to all students and will start at  p.m PERIOD in the Busch Student Center Ballrooms PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of Saint Louis University PERIOD Your contribution will help us cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD

The Student News Site of Saint Louis University
